landingPage.heroText: I am a front end developer at heart, but I have also done my share of fullstack work. I transform ideas into real, creative solutions. I have 8+ years of experience in the tech industry. I enjoy the working process of materializing ideas into something bigger. I look forward to collaborating with you to realize your aspirations.

services.title: Scalable UI Component Development
services.description: Build modular, reusable UI components tailored for performance and long-term maintainability.

services.title: API Integration Services
services.description: Seamlessly connect frontend applications with RESTful or GraphQL APIs for dynamic, data-driven interfaces.

services.title: Unit Testing Integration
services.description: Set up and integrate robust unit testing frameworks to ensure code quality and reduce regressions.

services.title: Web Application Performance Optimization
services.description: Improve load times, responsiveness, and core web vitals through targeted frontend performance enhancements.

services.title: Bug Fixes & Component Enhancements
services.description: Identify and resolve UI bugs, and enhance existing components to meet evolving requirements and improve UX.

services.title: Frontend Architecture Redesign
services.description: Redesign application architecture for scalability, cleaner code structure, and easier team collaboration.

services.title: Web Design Systems & Style Guide Development
services.description: Create consistent, scalable design systems and style guides that unify branding and UI standards.

skillsExperience.title: Skills & Experience
skillsExperience.paragraph1: The following section highlights my core technical skills and areas of expertise, developed through hands-on experience in web development and ongoing professional growth.

companies.name: 360Training
companies.description: Collaborated on the modernization of a Learning Management System using a modern tech stack: React.js, ASP.NET Core, Microservices, SQL Server, Docker, and Azure Cloud.

companies.name: Fiserv
companies.description: Collaborated on full-stack development for financial services projects, delivering high-quality solutions using a comprehensive tech stack: ASP.NET MVC, C#, REST, HTML, CSS3, Less, jQuery, and JavaScript.

companies.name: Mnet
companies.description: Implemented frontend (ASP.NET, C#, CSS, HTML, jQuery), backend (Web Services, SQL Server) tasks for e-commerce services.

companies.name: A&B Technology Solutions
companies.description: Implemented frontend (ASP.NET, Visual Basic, CSS, HTML, Javascript), backend (Web Services, SQL Server) tasks for healthcare services.

projects.title: Projects
projects.paragraph1: Projects that balance usability and structure with a curiosity for learning and experimenting with different tools.

projects.title: BookStore App
projects.description: Small book app with user management and book search system.

projects.title: Calendar App
projects.description: Calendar app for tracking your appointments.

projects.title: Kap App
projects.description: UI refresh for healing therapy website.

projects.title: Admin App
projects.description: Project structure template for scalable monolithic frontend application.

projects.title: Microfrontend App
projects.description: This test app explores microfrontend architecture with React JS, focusing on common bottlenecks like shared dependencies, module communication, and deployment challenges.

projects.title: Exploring Panda CSS
projects.description: Building a test app to explore Panda CSS and evaluate whether it's suitable for creating a maintainable style guide.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph1: Hi, I’m a software engineer with over 8 years of experience helping brands to solve complex problems through thoughtful, results-driven solutions.
aboutMe.paragraph2: Throughout my career, I have worked projects across financial services, e-learning, working with small and large teams. My approach is grounded in strategy, collaboration, and a deep understanding of both user needs and business goals.
aboutMe.paragraph3: I’m passionate about delivering excellence, continuous learning, and creating work that not only performs — but lasts. Whether it’s optimizing a product, scaling a system, or building a brand from the ground up, I bring clarity, and commitment to every stage of the process.

contact.title: Contact
contact.paragraph1: I am always open to new opportunities, creative collaborations, or simply connecting with like-minded people.
contact.paragraph2: Whether you are interested in working together, have a project in mind, or just want to say hello — feel free to reach out.
